metadata.title: CVE-2018-7754 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description: The aoedisk_debugfs_show function in drivers/block/aoe/aoeblk.c in theLinux kernel through 4.16.4rc4 allows local users to obtain sensitiveaddress information by reading "ffree: " lines in a debugfs file.

criterions.comment: linux: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
